attributes.action: Stop GCSE and A level exams summer 2021.
attributes.additional_details: Children are having a tough time keeping up with work. We need to do the same as Wales and Scotland. Our children deserve to be helped and get the results that they deserve based on teacher only assessments.
attributes.background: Help to get this sorted through the education department. Make it fair for our children to get the results they deserve.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
